hieros

𓊹𓊹𓊹 «nTr» God, who in Islam has 1000 names.

Some in Egypt might have been:

  1. 𓊹 «An» Ein* God 𒀭 𓎟 All Allah Ali Unas ein Ahne
  2. 𓊹𓊹 Devu Dei endow dual
  3. 𓊹𓊹𓊹 AnTer «nTr» Andro, Indra, Inri vs Nature

*Incense = 𓊹Ain𓌢ꜩ𓈖n𓍿δ𓂋r𓆴𓈒𓏥 𓍑𓊮 Intrancer

Although Egypt is renowned to be polytheistic, we often find text which just reference “the God”. Other times we find collections of praises such as 𓎟𓂋𓐍𓏜 “All Wissender”, “All Rechter”, “All Reckoner”, “All Xander”…

𒀭AN = God in Sumeria

𒀭 D’INgir ⇔ Dinger Dingis Deins Theis Theus Zeus Deus … Angel?
